SELECT p.`pk_id`, p.`panel_name`, p.`menu_id`, p.`remark`, p.`status`, p.`create_user`, p.`create_time`, p.`update_user`, p.`update_time` FROM conf_info_panel p WHERE p.`status` = 1
AND p.pk_id not in ( select rp.panel_id FROM priv_map_role_panel rp where rp.`status`=1 and rp.role_id=#{roleId} )
and p.menu_id =#{menuId}
AND p.panel_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{panelName}),'%')
